title: Puppet, ca. 1800
description:
"Don Quixote"
Shadow Puppets, Theatre Seraphin

1936-14-7-20* - originally 7W is a Windmill comprised of 25 pieces

1936-14-7-20-1/3 -  Three Arms
1936-14-7-20- 4   -  One Head
1936-14-7-20-5/14 - Ten Legs
1936-14-7-20- 15   - One Jester Head
1936-14-7-20- 16   - One Head with Torso
1936-14-7-20-17/21- Five Bases
1936-14-7-20- 22   -  One Soldier with Whip
1936-14-7-20- 23   -  One Soldier Head
1936-14-7-20- 24   -  One Pair of Legs
1936-14-7-20- 25   -  One Part

[information transcribed from the Registrar's Ledger.  O. Urbay 8 Mar 2011]
